backend/main.mo: Motoko actor managing route metadata with waypoint structures, CRUD operations, filtering, and authorization checks via AccessControl.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping product feature IDs to related source files, components, tests, and confidence metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summary list describing the purpose of each frontend file in the project.
frontend/index.css: Empty stylesheet placeholder for global frontend styles.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point loading the React app via main.tsx into a root div.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app controlling game modes, route panels, vehicle variant selection, and rendering the 3D GameView with UI overlays.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthStatusB: Auth status bar showing login state and rendering the login/logout button.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Internet Identity login/logout button handling authentication flow and query cache clearing.
React hook that initializes an AudioContext and generates engine and road noise oscillators, updating their frequency and gain based on speed, acceleration, and enabled state.
frontend/src/game/camera/FollowCamera.ts: React Three Fiber component that positions and smoothly interpolates a camera behind or inside a vehicle or walker depending on game mode and camera mode.
frontend/src/game/GameView.tsx: Primary 3D scene container rendering world, truck/walker, camera, HUD, routes, NPC traffic, and handling audio and route-creator interactions.
frontend/src/game/routes/ActiveRouteStat: Zustand store tracking the active route, current waypoint, and distance to next, updating progress as the truck approaches waypoints.
frontend/src/game/routes/RouteCreatorSta: Zustand store for building editable routes, supporting waypoint CRUD, reordering, metadata fields, validation, and clearing the draft.
frontend/src/game/routes/RouteEditorPane: UI panel for editing and saving routes, allowing waypoint management and metadata input, and posting the route to backend via mutation.
frontend/src/game/routes/RoutesPanel.tsx: Panel listing saved routes with load and delete options, showing metadata and enforcing author permissions for deletions.
frontend/src/game/routes/RouteVisualizer: Three.js component that renders waypoint markers and a Catmull‑Rom curve line to visualize a route in edit or play mode.
frontend/src/game/traffic/NpcTraffic.tsx: Creates and updates instanced and detailed NPC cars using deterministic randomness and respawns them around the player.
frontend/src/game/ui/HUD.tsx: Renders speed, audio, camera controls, and driving help UI based on game mode and player state.
frontend/src/game/utils/deterministicRan: Implements a simple deterministic LCG-based random generator with range and integer helpers.
frontend/src/game/vehicle/Truck.tsx: Handles truck movement, keyboard controls, physics-like acceleration, steering, and exposes state via a ref handle.
frontend/src/game/vehicle/Walker.tsx: Implements basic walking movement, rotation, and keyboard controls for a humanoid avatar.
frontend/src/game/world/CityClusters.tsx: Generates deterministic city clusters near the player and renders buildings and light cubes.
frontend/src/game/world/ConstructionEven: Spawns deterministic construction zones with cones, barrels, and signage along the player's path.
frontend/src/game/world/GasStop.tsx: Renders a gas station scene with textured canopy, pumps, pillars, and signage using Three.js materials and repeated metal textures.
frontend/src/game/world/HighwayAndBridge: Creates a highway and bridge environment with textured road surfaces, lane markings, ramps, and structural supports.
frontend/src/game/world/InfiniteRoad.tsx: Implements looping road segments that reposition based on player movement, with textured road surfaces and markings.
frontend/src/game/world/PowerLines.tsx: Generates deterministic utility poles with textures, optional transformers and guy wires, and connects them with overhead cables.
frontend/src/game/world/PowerStations.ts: Places power stations probabilistically along the player’s route, each with buildings, transformers, towers, and fencing.
frontend/src/game/world/TruckStop.tsx: Builds a truck stop area with parking bays, signage, a rest building, fuel pumps, and lighting structures.
frontend/src/game/world/World.tsx: Renders the 3D world scene with textured terrain, roads, structures, and random objects, and handles ground click events.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity, invalidating queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and logic for loading, managing, and authenticating Internet Identity using AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching, saving, and deleting route metadata through the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets up Tailwind base styles and custom theme variables for light and dark modes with a truck‑themed palette.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React, wraps the app in query and identity providers, and loads global styles.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers to read, store, persist, and clear URL and session‑based parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, typography, animations, and theme extensions using OKLCH variables.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s current state, known issues, and a list of existing features for a driving simulation, including infinite highways, drivable bridges, and world landmarks.
